Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Didnt really have many good restaurants nearby but there is bakery just around the corner if you want a different breakfast from the hotel
Positive_Review: Breakfast spread every morning was delicious with options to custom order eggs any way you want to Cafe machine produced some great cappuccino and cafe latte The rooms were standard size and big enough to put luggage and still have space to walk around The views from the room were not bad Room service was thorough with their cleaning and did a splendid job

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Parking fees 20 euro per day Wifi mentioned free But actually only 0 5 mb is free Above 0 5 mb to be paid Breakfast in hotel 20 euro Which is not worth it But many restaurants in stations
Positive_Review: Located nearby Train Station Quite area Clean

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Nothing to reproach
Positive_Review: Absolutely great stay Modern very nicely and tastfully decorated hotel spacious rooms everything looking great Wide selection at breakfast and everything really tasty I totally recommend great value for money I would expect higher price for this kind of standard in Vienna 10 minute walk from Prater and 1 minute walk from subway station

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Being upsold at check in to a larger room with breakfast included I didn t need the larger room nor could I have ever eaten enough to justify the premium charged I was jet lagged and easily manipulated I was made to feel like I was being done a favour when it was really a disservice Naked coed sauna was also a surprise
Positive_Review: The gym was the reason I chose the hotel and it was well equipped Restaurant was lovely as were the staff

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast was 20 euro per person Hotel is blocking deposit money on your credit card
Positive_Review: Clean new close to the Pratter park and metro station Wifi surprisingly was free and fast

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Twin beds were combined to create a single bed this caused the lamps on the headboard to be positioned awkwardly right in the middle of the bed had to be careful while getting in out of the bed
Positive_Review: Excellent location Just 5 mins away from the Krieau subway station A 15 min subway ride takes you to the city center Vienna Opera Karlsplatz Airport shuttle bus stops right in front of the Krieau subway station easy commute to the airport Eur 8 per person and takes 25 mins Google maps doesn t pick up the subway system in Vienna To plan your sight seeing trips in Vienna just look for the closest subway station and use Google maps just for the final leg of the trip walking bit only

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Good location 2 minutes walk to Krieu metro station make it easy to access to town center 24 Hours metro ticket would be benefit for travelling Surrounding was quiet and relaxing SPAR supermarket nearby Every things in room were of high standard Staff were nice and very helpful we were really appreciate the early check in

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The cost of breakfast at E 20 was more than I am willing to pay
Positive_Review: The room was very clean and super comfy Very close to subway station so could get around Vienna easily At the time we were there the road outside was very quiet making it very easy to relax The park was very close too wish we had had more time to explore

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Wifi is only free in reception and restaurant in the room wifi is charged
Positive_Review: Very close to subway station which makes travelling to city centre extremely easy

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great hotel in a brilliant location just outside the main city Metro station just outside the hotel Hotel was nice and clean room was nice and bed was comfortable Would definatly stay here again

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: nothing all fantastic
Positive_Review: I was there with my husband for concert and we were very satisfied with room breakfast accommodation all Hotel is situated on nice area so we must come back Next time with our son

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: expensive underground parking 20 per night and breakfast 20
Positive_Review: fitness wellness at the top floor with the view of Vienna nice quiet environment vicinity of the Prater amusement park river Danube and City aquapark with pools and slides etc

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The reception told us that breakfast is until 12 but when we came 2 waiters have tolds us that on that day is just until 11 30 that we have to hurry up grab the food that we want because they will close everthing They repeated this message over and over again in a quite rude way So the Relaxing Moment of having breakfast was completly gone and plus this was a misunderstanding between reception and breakfast staff
Positive_Review: The breakfast was really nice and on sunday is until 12

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Positive_Review: The room was great big and clean The personnel was amazing the lady s from the reception started to speak in my language Romanian Th breakfast was great The location is excellent

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Expected a bit more from the breakfast It was good nevertheless
Positive_Review: Great location close to metro and in a quiet surroundings Extremely comfy bed slept like a baby

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The property located in a very nice area with a lot of modern buildings and nice small pond nearby Also the subway station is in 2 minutes walk from the property The whole area near the hotel is so quiet and peaceful Good choice for people who wants to stay far from crowdy centre streets But it takes only 10 20 minutes by train to get to the city centre The staff was very friendly and careful The room was clean and modern Everything was great Hope to visit it more in future

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Taxi took me to the wrong Marriott Courtyard as it was not obvious on booking sheet that there were 3 other hotels in this group in city
Positive_Review: Hotel was new and very clean and appealing

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Terrible soundproofing of the room You can hear all night the bathroom water from the neighbour rooms When somebody closed the door in the room next to us the entire wall and the bed moved We were very surprised to find this in a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: Nice hotel very clean and spacious rooms

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No bathtub but it s a very small issue hardly worth mentioning
Positive_Review: Quiet very modern streamlined hotel Well trained helpful stuff decent good food Good place for inexpensive stop

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: no complaints with hotel and liked the restaurant
Positive_Review: this is a good hotel in the business and education area very close to u2 rail exec service into vienna city centre

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Room had two problems 1 TV didn t work I contacted hotel staff they tried to fix it and by 9 pm they told me they couldn t fix it and offered a new room which is way too late at 9pm I wanted to just open the TV and sleep rather than repack and unpack They didn t even offer to compensate 2 The bathroom shower was leaking from the tube
Positive_Review: Location was great bed was comfortable

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast should have been more affordable Toiletaires in the room need to be better quality
Positive_Review: The Staff was very courteous and efficient the room was spacious and basic but clean The location is ideal next to a train station but not city centre

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast was alright but have already seen better ones on other Vienna trips but the breakfast and quality is still very good
Positive_Review: Room was quite spacious bathroom and shower was proper sized good quality and condition of the room

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I found the staff hard working and accommodating I was particularly grateful to have Alexandra s help and advice for a number of different things This was one of the best hotel experiences I have ever had

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Internet was slow unless you paid for it Parking was 20 Euro and we were not informed until leaving
Positive_Review: Beds were amazing bathroom was great very clean and comfortable rooms Friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: 20 for parking by day for the circumstance that there is NO OTHER possibilty to parc the car even not for me as a leg handicapped person this is to be informed directly and clear before booking For me such surprises make me angry The hotel is quite far from the center so it is already nescessary to take much more time and cost to come and go There should be a free or very cheap parking for hotel guests
Positive_Review: The room was very clean large enough and quiet Comfortable bed Perfekt located for visiting the MESSE WIEN

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: They musn t have had occupants in our room for quite a while as there was dust on the bathroom countertops and the bathroom itself smelt of mildew disuse not very pleasant at all We did not bother with a room change request as we were only staying one night and had already unpacked There is nothing to do or eat in the local area so you have to plan around being in the main city hub for entertainment and food
Positive_Review: The king size bed made for a good nights sleep Being on the 7th floor was nice as we had somewhat of a view The location isn t walkable to the main sights of Vienna but it is located 1min walk to a subway station and my partner and I made use of the city bike hire scheme to get around so that was fine

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Absolutely nothing to complain about
Positive_Review: The location close to a station of the metro makes access to the city centre easy ALL personnel was professional smiling and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: I had an issue with payment manager on the reception first charged me incorrectly and had to charge me once more along with pre authorization on check in a had triple the amount of money locked on my card then the overall living cost for three days And after that three days I didn t get the transaction cancelled but got the refund and thus lost money on currency conversion So be very accurate with amount of money on your card and with payment operations
Positive_Review: Hotel is extremely close to the subway station which makes travelling to the city center very fast Also the university campus and park nearby are fabulous to take a walk The breakfast was great room was clean and comfortable

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: I visited in early April and rooms werea little bit too warm at night with windows open even
Positive_Review: I like the staff response and cleanliness of the hotel It is really close to Metro Station like 1 min walk

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast could have been wider in range Taste is very fine very delicious but not too many to choose
Positive_Review: We stayed in a deluxe room It was more than enough for our dog Pleasant surprise there were personnel who spoke Hungarian and Turkish so it was super easy to communicate Pet friendly Hotel I was there for Prater Run so the location is the best Also only 3 or 4 metro stops to go to the center

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Location is quite far away from city center but it has a subway station right around the corner
Positive_Review: Staff is very friendly We checked in exactly on a Christmas Eve and have received very lovely Christmas present from receptionist Staff helped us to order some food delivery because the time we checked in hotel restaurant was closed already Room has a good space even in standard room

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast no fish offered for meat non eaters In the evening the variety of dishes for ordering to the room is very limited Shall not be like this in 4
Positive_Review: Excellent location especially for WU visitors Messe Wien visitors Metro in 1 min walk Fairly good breakfast Very nice staff Kettle and tea coffee set in the room it was exec room or smth like this Good wifi Area around is pleasant Prater park etc You can order food from restaurant till 10 pm

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Getting the right information from the front desk staff was not easy I called and inquired about how to get from the wein train station to the hotel and was told I could only get to the hotel via taxi which in fact was not the case Also getting a map of Vienna that was readable was non existent as the map I recieved was so hard to read it made my trip harder and more time consuming Very frustrating when you have only a few days to explore
Positive_Review: Location to the train station was great The hotel was very clean and quiet

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: we booked a room with a double bed but instead we had a room with two single beds put together and thus the night lamps were right above our heads and not next to the beds Didn t bother us too much though
Positive_Review: excellent hotel fabulous service staff great breakfast very clean excellent facilities very comfy beds close to the subway

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Reception bar and lounge area all one big open space making it very loud and hard to hear when checking in Restaurant menu limited and not much else in the area but we found a Thai place across the street Fire alarm pulled one morning and it seemed the staff was confused about what to do
Positive_Review: Quiet room Convenient to local metro stop to City Center Large breakfast buffet with gluten free bread and good coffee Nice hotel but more for business than leisure

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The staff is not so friendly at the front desk at breakfast they where really friendly Breakfast is okay but not a very big choice
Positive_Review: The room was great quit nice view perfect connection to the city

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The breakfast although very good a bit too expensive per person
Positive_Review: Impecable rooms warm spacious and well lighted Very close to the metro station which was conveniant since we took the metro often Breakfast food was delicious and plenty Parking space was a big plus especially since the cars were not outside but safely in the underground garage

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The room could have been a bit cleaner when we arrived the toilet seemed used and there was one towel with a stain on it
Positive_Review: The gym was really well equipped Location of hotel right next to spar and a metro station so it was easy to access central Vienna The breakfast was really good

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: I missed floor heating in bathroom
Positive_Review: Nice big windows quite very comfortable bed good breakfast internet and parking for free and stuff was helpful and kind

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Although I booked early they didn t had the room I asked for so I hade to upgrade for much more money to a bigger room My VISA card was preauthorized although by booking it was said it wont be Breakfast is not worth the 20 euros Parking is ridiculosly expensive too
Positive_Review: The location is next to the U Bahn the staff is very friendly and polite

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Although I paid during check out the invoice the hotel did not unblock the guaranty amount they took on check in additional 50 of the value as a guaranty
Positive_Review: friendly and helpful staff near to the subway

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: NEGATIVE NO ROOM SERVICE AND VERY SMALL MENU TO CHOOSE FROM SO DON T PLAN TO HAVE DINNER OR LUNCH IF UR SOMEONE WHO LIKES TO GREAT VARIETY OF OPTIONS TO CHOOSE FROM HOTEL PROMISED TAXI AT FLAT RATE OF 30 EUROS BUT THE TAXI DRIVER CHARGED US 36 EUROS SAYING THAT HE DON T HAVE ANY AGREEMENT WITH HOTEL STAFF
Positive_Review: THIS PLACE IS ABOUT 4 5 KM AWAY FROM CITY BUT GOOD CONNECTIVITY FROM METRO ABT 2 3 MINS WALK NEAREST SIGHTING PLACE IS PRATER WHEEL ABT 2 STOPS IN METRO AND 10 MINS IN TAXI ST STEPHENS CATHEDRAL IS ABT 15 MINS BY TAXI ABT 12 EUROS TAKES ABT 25 MINS TO AIRPORT AND COSTS ABT 35 EUROS

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: SPA facilities are very good with a nice view over Vienna Front desk personnal especially FRUZSINA are very helpful proactively solving our needs will definitively return on my next trip

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: staff very unprofessional made a mistake of 200 euros in billing and would not even accept their mistake initially blatantly skin rasict bar has very poor cocktails
Positive_Review: lovely rooms good ambience

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No bell guy one trolly self service if someone use it you will have to carry all your lagguge your self They charge 19 EUR for their own parking Not what you expect when staying in Marriott
Positive_Review: Reception employees were super nice quit area and good Location

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The location wasn t awful but it was hard to do anything without a cab In fact they recommended I not walk around at night and there was no reason to Very business like area and if I d been there on business I would have loved the neighborhood and the quiet
Positive_Review: Front desk staff was exceptional Friendly and knew what they were talking about

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very good breakfast nice location of hotel staff was helpful and friendly all was good And there was nice view on city from hotel room and spa area

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The only thing I didn t like in the hotel where otherwise everything has been perfect was the use of moquette in the room which reduces its impression of cleanliness Also the room cleaning gave the impression to be a little bit quick on some days or maybe I left the room too tidy and they thought there was not much left to do
Positive_Review: Great location next to a metro station and a university campus in a recently developed area of the city The staff is extremely kind and the entire hotel is modern functional and bright The rooms are spacious The hotel facilities are also great and open almost the entire day

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: In general I am happy with my stay Two suggestions Service during the breakfast could be improved There was enough staff around but somehow nobody took enough care of removing dirty dishes from the tables after people had left Cleaning of the rooms especially the bathroom needs more attention too
Positive_Review: The location is next to the subway some 20 minutes ride from the main attractions The staff is very friendly The gym is impressive having most of the equipment I use in my own sport school That s a much richer choice than the usual cross trainer and treadmill hotels tend to have in a gym Breakfast buffet is tasty and has enough choice

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: can get free wifi almost everywhere in the hotel but slow
Positive_Review: subway is nearby travel with one under 1 y o baby the hotel had already prepared a baby crib before we arrived

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very nice modern hotel with large and clean rooms It is in the heart of Prater just 50 meters from the metro The staff is charming Very good price value scale

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: But hotel charge money incorrect instead 88 euro they charged 247 euro so be careful as you will have many times to ask your money back but they did not refund
Positive_Review: Hotel was clean location good near metro station

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The location is really not far from the city 2 minutes walk to subway station and very quiet The Internet is for free and you can pay more for high speed Nice room and comfortable bed Overall great experience

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The pre authorisation was 3 times more than the cost of the room and i haven t received my money back not even after 4 days The parking was ridiculosly expensive and very unpracticle to use it Minibar was empty wi fi sucks Overall my worst tourist experience Never go back
Positive_Review: Clean and tidy Good location

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The air conditioning cooling turn off after 12 AM
Positive_Review: The value of the hotel Cleanliness of the entire hotel Close to metro station Close to supermarket 600m from shopping mall 800from swimming pools stadium 1000m from prater park

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: They took a deposit by blocking the sum on the card but also we gave them the deposit and price for the room by cash so i would appreciate if they charged just once not twice Also i would appreciate as we were having room for two shampoo for each of us and also the shower gel
Positive_Review: We asked for toothpastes and for a comb and we got them at the reception room was clean relatively big and new

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It s very near the Metro station The breakfast buffet had a lot of choices Quiet area Near enough to the city center with just a coupleof stops via the Metro

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: we were waken up early in the morning A member of staff knocked at our door and asked what time we d check out I complained to the reception and they told us we could have put do not disturb sign That is not normal
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location was excellent Walking distance hardly 100m from the metro line U2 that connects it to pretty much all the major attractions in Vienna within 15 mins The ambiance was nice and the room very comfortable The staff were helpful as well I would give it a big fat thumbs up

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The parking is expensive although the garage is very secured
Positive_Review: Good facilities and decent rooms very good soundproofing Breakfast was nice Although it says paid WIFI there was a free option if you do not want a super fast one

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast is 20 euro which is very expensive On the last day the air conditioning didn t work properly because apparently the outside temperature the previous day was not high enough Would expect better from this hotel
Positive_Review: Comfortable room with good quality bedding Location is very close to Ubahn station so it is quick and easy to get into central Vienna

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Breakfast items were very poorly maintained On my last breakfast there were no scrambled eggs and the container had obviously not been filled for some time as the edges were covered with dry and congealed egg The orange juice was awful not really juice The bacon was just dry and almost inedible I like crispy bacon but this was a step too far The many yoghurts were not labelled so you had no idea what you were eating Actually there were hardly any labels for the food
Positive_Review: Very good shower

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: What could you expect fro Marriott Good hotel Relatively good location Very close to the station and very quiet and safe around It takes about ten mins or even less to get to city centre if you get off at Universitat station The room was spacious and clean Pretty nice view from the room We had the double bedroom Didn t take any breakfast in the hotel as it was rather expensive 20 euros per person when you can spend about 15 euros only in the city for both

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The breakfast is disappointing Expensive 20 Euros per person not much options Once was enought
Positive_Review: Very nice staff very helpful and friendly I think a find a hotel I would like to stay again in my next visits Highly recommend it

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: I felt cold at night wish there was an additional blanket Location wise I wish there are more restaurants nearby I was surprised and disappointed that the European Marriott hotels do not give Gold members breakfast with the room
Positive_Review: I really liked the hotel manager who helped straighten out some reservation problems I had with Booking com I liked my room the bed and the hot water boiler I liked the location for its proximity to a subway station

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Location was too far from city not good restaurants nearby Even hotel restaurant closed very early at night I asked for double bed but we got room with 2 separate beds
Positive_Review: Nice hotel with all 4 star comforts close to metro station

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The breakfast is expensive so we chose to opt out of it

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: Every thing was perfect for 4 stars hotel
Positive_Review: Friendly profissional staff Excelent room the pillows could be with more options Excent location Excent parking

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
Negative_Review: The internet doesn t work on your phone in the room interesting why and you have to pay for hotel internet which very expensive 10 EUR per day great businees guys Assuming the hotel set up sensors which breaking internet connection on phone usually chineese hotels do it Breakfast is very poor no variety Room wasn t clean properly sometimes If you book hotel via booking com you cannot collect reward points and I got this information after second staying and the last but before I was informed it s possible The conditioning system isn t clean after staying I had allergy coughing and cold in the nose At winter time it s very cold in room I asked 2 times to fix it but my requests were ignored It s the last time when I stayed in this hotel Don t recommend to stay in this hotel as well
Positive_Review: Gym is good

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe

Hotel_Name: Courtyard by Marriott Vienna Prater Messe
